entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:22 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
